title: Building the Korg NTS-2 (Also I’m in a Bjook)
description:
Korg and Bjooks have teamed up for a new edition of Patch and Tweak which comes bundled with the Korg NTS-2 multi-function music tool. Also, I'm in the book, which I guess is pretty cool. Let's build the NTS-2 and check out how it works.

I've launched a new Bandcamp Backstage with exclusive uploads every month. Head on over here if you're interested: https://soundvision.bandcamp.com/backstage

https://www.korg.co.uk/products/nts-2

00:00 unboxing
03:58 nts-2 build
07:05 nts-2 feature demo
13:00 outro sounds
